venue.name: China Pearl Dim Sum and Restaurant

item.description:
China Pearl Woburn looks to offer all the exotic taste offerings you'd expect from an expedition to Chinatown, with one key difference: free parking! But we hear it gets pretty mobbed on Sundays when the traditional brunch crowd comes out. So let's check it out on a Saturday!

If this is your first meetup with us, please note you must pay a $3.00 reservation fee to RSVP. This money will be added to the tip for our table, which I will sort out.
item.how_to_find_us: I will have a Meetup tent card on the table
item.name: Dim Sum Saturday at China Pearl Woburn
